org.hibernate.search.bridge

Interface TwoWayFieldBridge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FieldBridge, StringBridge
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DurationBridge, ElasticsearchCalendarBridge, ElasticsearchDateBridge, InstantBridge, NullEncodingTwoWayFieldBridge, NumericEncodingCalendarBridge, NumericEncodingDateBridge, NumericFieldBridge, StringEncodingCalendarBridge, StringEncodingDateBridge, TwoWayString2FieldBridgeAdaptor, TwoWayString2FieldBridgeIgnoreAnalyzerAdaptor, YearBridge

    public interface TwoWayFieldBridge
extends FieldBridge, StringBridge
    A FieldBridge able to convert the index representation back into an object without losing information. Any bridge expected to process a document id should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Build the element object from the Document

        Build the element object from the Document

      • objectToString

        String objectToString(Object object)
        Convert the object representation to a string.
        Specified by:
        objectToString in interface StringBridge
        Parameters:
        object - The object to index.
        Returns:
        string (index) representation of the specified object. Must not be null, but can be empty.
